lin

toAdd

add

@RequestMapping(value="/addFeedback")
@ResponseBody
public void add(Feedback object,
                                            javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                            javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
         throws java.io.IOException
添加反馈并重定向

object - Feedback对象
request - Request对象
